Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Ah! <MYNAME>!

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Perfect timing! Lady Elise has been
acting...unusual all day.

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Not long ago, she began pacing back and forth
in the foyer.
<PAGE>
Could I trouble you to go and check on her? If
you have a moment, of course.

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Thank you so much! Please, follow me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
O-oh! <MYNAME>. Good day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm? Acting oddly? Moi?
<PAGE>
It's nothing. I am, as always, unflappable. That
one of my cows is in labor and about to bear a
calf is hardly a matter worthy of my concern!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Er...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I should be there? Wh-why on earth must I be
present at the birth of a mere cow? Am I to
provide moral support?
<PAGE>
As I said, it hardly merits my concern. If you're
so interested, go and watch it yourself.

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Please, go. If you go, then Lady Elise may find
the courage to follow after you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah...!

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Lady Elise...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, all right! If you're going to be so persistent
about it, I'll go!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I am not, I repeat, NOT going because I am
personally worried. I am going because you
hounded me!

<NAME_MOB_MAX>
Wait, who are you? Why are you here?

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
Oh, I see. You came because Lady Elise told you
to check on how the birth was coming along.
<PAGE>
Everything went well. The calf was just born, in
fact. As you can see, it looks perfectly healthy.

<NAME_MOB_MAX>
You think Lady Elise will come herself?

<NAME_MOB_MAX>
That's a shame. I was hoping to show her the
new calf.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Because you INSISTED I decided...HUFF...that I
would check...HUFF...up on the calf myself.
How...HUFF...how is it doing?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is healthy and happy?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh. Well, that's wonderful news.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never knew how small a newborn calf could
be.
<PAGE>
Even though it's so small, it put all its effort into
being born. I guess it has to do that before it
can do anything else.

<NAME_MOB_MAX>
It looks happy to see you, my lady.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh...

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
My lady, we need to make preparations for the
new calf. Could you please watch over it for a
bit?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What? W-wait! Come back!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Er...Now what do I do?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, were you present for the birth?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah. I wonder what it's like, to see a new life
come into this world. It seems...messy.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I should not have spent so much time waffling. I
ought to have been here for the birth.
<PAGE>
Seeing this little one now makes me regret my
earlier hesitance.
<PAGE>
Seeing a new life take its first steps is a more
moving experience than I had imagined.
<PAGE>
Human or livestock, a birth is something to be
celebrated, right?
<PAGE>
I was foolish to be so bullheaded. I missed my
chance to be here for something great.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're right, <MYNAME>. Next time the chance
arises, I will make sure I am present for it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Er...<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
I feel that, because of your prodding me to be
here today, I learned something very important.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>At first I thought you were simply being,
er...meddlesome. Now...I'm grateful you were.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_LOVE>Thank you...<MYNAME>. I guess sometimes we
all need that push.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A-anyway! Everything is now well in hand here,
so let us get back to our daily concerns.
<PAGE>
Besides, my farm's proprietary secrets are all
around us here, and I can't risk you seeing them.
Come on, then, out with you!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello there, little one. As of today, you're the
newest member of my farm. I'm glad you're
here.
